by the way<WG3598> which<WG3739> he dedicated<WG1457> for us,<WG2254> a new<WG4372> and<WG2532> living<WG2198> way,<WG3598> through<WG1223> the veil,<WG2665> that<WG5124> is to say,<WG2076> his<WG846> flesh;<WG4561>
and<WG2532> having a great<WG3173> priest<WG2409> over<WG1909> the house<WG3624> of God,<WG2316>

let<WG4334>'s draw near with<WG3326> a true<WG228> heart<WG2588> in<WG1722> fullness<WG4136> of faith,<WG4102> having<WG4472> our hearts<WG2588> sprinkled<WG4472> from<WG575> an<WG4893> evil<WG4190> conscience,<WG4893> and<WG2532> having our body<WG4983> washed<WG3068> with pure<WG2513> water,<WG5204>

not<WG3361> forsaking<WG1459> our own<WG1438> assembling<WG1997> together,<WG1997> as<WG2531> the custom<WG1485> of some<WG5100> is,<WG235> but exhorting<WG3870> one another;<WG2532> and so much<WG5118> the more,<WG3123> as<WG3745> you see<WG991> the Day<WG2250> approaching.<WG1448>

partly,<WG3303> being exposed<WG2301> to both<WG5037> reproaches<WG3680> and<WG2532> oppressions;<WG2347> and<WG1161> partly,<WG5124> becoming<WG1096> partakers<WG2844> with those who were<WG390> treated<WG390> so.<WG3779>
